summary.span: 允许你使用其他源的数据有效地批量加载 SQL Server 表。

span.span: Lets you efficiently bulk load a SQL Server table with data from another source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft SQL Server 包含一个用于将数据从一个表移到另一个**表的常用**命令提示实用工具，无论是在单个服务器上还是在服务器之间。Microsoft SQL Server includes a popular command-prompt utility named **bcp** for moving data from one table to another, whether on a single server or between servers. 通过 类可以编写提供类似功能的托管代码解决方案。The class lets you write managed code solutions that provide similar functionality. 还可以通过其他方式将数据加载到 SQL Server 表中（例如 INSERT 语句），但 在其上提供显著的性能优势。There are other ways to load data into a SQL Server table (INSERT statements, for example), but offers a significant performance advantage over them. 类只能用于向 SQL Server 表中写入数据。The class can be used to write data only to SQL Server tables. 但是，数据源不限于 SQL Server;可以使用任何数据源，只要数据可以加载到 实例或使用 @no__t 的实例读取即可。However, the data source is not limited to SQL Server; any data source can be used, as long as the data can be loaded to a instance or read with a instance. 将类型 的 @no__t 1 列大容量加载到类型为 SQL Server 2008 中添加的日期/时间类型之一的 SQL Server 列时，@no__t 0 将失败。 will fail when bulk loading a column of type into a SQL Server column whose type is one of the date/time types added in SQL Server 2008. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何使用 类加载数据。The following console application demonstrates how to load data using the class. 在此示例中，使用了一个 @no__t 0 将数据从 SQL Server **AdventureWorks**数据库中的**Product**表复制到同一数据库中的类似表。In this example, a is used to copy data from the **Production.Product** table in the SQL Server **AdventureWorks** database to a similar table in the same database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. source table and destination table each include an Identity column. 默认情况下，在目标表中为添加的每个行生成**标识**列的新值。By default, a new value for the **Identity** column is generated in the destination table for each row added. 在此示例中，当打开连接时，将设置一个选项，该选项强制大容量加载进程改为使用源表中的**标识**值。In this example, an option is set when the connection is opened that forces the bulk load process to use the **Identity** values from the source table instead. 若要查看选项如何更改大容量加载的工作方式，请运行包含 dbo 的示例 **。BulkCopyDemoMatchingColumns**表为空。To see how the option changes the way the bulk load works, run the sample with the 约束冲突而未添加行。An exception is thrown and the code writes a message to the console notifying you that rows weren't added because of primary key constraint violations. > [!IMPORTANT] > member this.BatchSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 每一批次中的行数。

span.span: Number of rows in each batch.

summary.span: 在每一批次结束时，将该批次中的行发送到服务器。

span.span: At the end of each batch, the rows in the batch are sent to the server.

value.span: 属性的整数值；如果未设置任何值，则为零。

span.span: The integer value of the property, or zero if no value has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当处理 @no__t 0 行或没有更多的行要发送到目标数据源时，批处理已完成。A batch is complete when rows have been processed or there are no more rows to send to the destination data source. 零（默认值）指示每个 操作都是一个批处理。Zero (the default) indicates that each operation is a single batch. 如果在未使用 选项的情况下声明了 实例，则每次将行发送到服务器 @no__t 2 行，但不执行与事务相关的操作。If the instance has been declared without the option in effect, rows are sent to the server rows at a time, but no transaction-related action is taken. 如果 有效，则每批行均作为单独的事务插入。If is in effect, each batch of rows is inserted as a separate transaction. 可以随时设置 属性。The property can be set at any time. 如果大容量复制已在进行中，则根据以前的批大小调整当前批的大小。If a bulk copy is already in progress, the current batch is sized according to the previous batch size. 后续批次使用新的大小。Subsequent batches use the new size. 如果 @no__t 0 最初为零并在 @no__t 操作已在进行中更改，则该操作将以单个批处理的方式加载数据。If the is initially zero and changed while a operation is already in progress, that operation loads the data as a single batch. 对同一 @no__t 实例执行的任何后续 @no__t 0 操作都将使用新的 。Any subsequent operations on the same instance use the new . ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序演示如何以批处理50行的方式大容量加载数据。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data in batches of 50 rows. 有关演示 如何与事务一起使用的示例，请参阅[事务和大容量复制操作](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md)。For an example illustrating how works with a transaction, see [Transaction and Bulk Copy Operations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md). 在此示例中，首先将源数据从 SQL Server 表读取到 @no__t 实例。In this example, the source data is first read from a SQL Server table to a instance. 源数据不必位于 SQL Server 上;可以使用任何可读取到 @no__t 0 或加载到 的数据源。The source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 超时之前操作完成所允许的秒数。

span.span: Number of seconds for the operation to complete before it times out.
The integer value of the property.
The default is 30 seconds.

value.span: 值为 0 表示无限制，大容量复制将无限期等待。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates no limit; the bulk copy will wait indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果操作超时，则不会提交事务，并从目标表中删除所有复制的行。If the operation does time out, the transaction is not committed and all copied rows are removed from the destination table. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序演示如何在大容量加载数据时修改超时时间为60秒。The following console application demonstrates how to modify the time-out to 60 seconds when bulk loading data. 在此示例中，首先将源数据从 SQL Server 表读取到 @no__t 实例。In this example, the source data is first read from a SQL Server table to a instance. 源数据不必位于 SQL Server 上;可以使用任何可读取到 @no__t 0 或加载到 的数据源。The source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 @no__t @ no__t 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]`INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对 @no__t 对象调用 后，其他操作将不会成功。After you call a on the object, no other operation will succeed. 对 方法的调用将引发 @no__t 1。Calls to the method will throw an . 从 @no__t 的事件调用 @no__t 的方法将导致引发 。Calling the method from the event causes an to be thrown. 请注意，打开 实例在 @no__t 块的末尾隐式关闭。Note that open instances are closed implicitly at the end of a `using` block. ## Examples 下面的示例使用相同的 实例向两个目标表添加销售订单及其关联的详细信息。The following example uses the same instance to add sales orders and their associated details to two destination tables. 由于**AdventureWorks**销售订单表很大，因此该示例只读取某个帐号号下的订单，并将这些订单和详细信息大容量复制到目标表中。Because the **AdventureWorks** sales order tables are large, the sample reads only orders placed by a certain account number and bulk copies those orders and details to the destination tables. 仅当大容量复制操作完成后，才使用 方法。The method is used only after both bulk copy operations are complete. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. span.span: Column mappings define the relationships between columns in the data source and columns in the destination.
A collection of column mappings.
By default, it is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据源和目标表具有相同的列数，并且数据源中每个源列的序号位置与相应目标列的序号位置匹配，则不需要 @no__t 0 集合。If the data source and the destination table have the same number of columns, and the ordinal position of each source column within the data source matches the ordinal position of the corresponding destination column, the collection is unnecessary. 但是，如果列数不同，或者序号位置不一致，则必须使用 才能确保将数据复制到正确的列。However, if the column counts differ, or the ordinal positions are not consistent, you must use to make sure that data is copied into the correct columns. 在执行大容量复制操作期间，可以访问此集合，但不能对其进行更改。During the execution of a bulk copy operation, this collection can be accessed, but it cannot be changed. 任何更改尝试都将引发 。Any attempt to change it will throw an .

you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设计用于阐释大容量复制操作进度的用户界面组件。This property is designed for user interface components that illustrate the progress of a bulk copy operation. 它指示生成通知事件之前要处理的行数。It indicates the number of rows to be processed before generating a notification event. 即使正在进行大容量复制操作，也可以随时设置 属性。The property can be set at any time, even while a bulk copy operation is underway. 在大容量复制操作过程中所做的更改将在下一次通知后生效。Changes made during a bulk copy operation take effect after the next notification. 新设置适用于在同一实例上的所有后续操作。The new setting applies to all subsequent operations on the same instance. 如果 @no__t 设置为一个小于零的值，则将引发 。If is set to a number less than zero, an is thrown. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序演示如何使用已打开的连接大容量加载数据。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data using a connection that is already open. 设置 @no__t 的属性，以便在将每50行复制到表后调用事件处理程序。The property is set so that the event handler is called after every 50 rows copied to the table. 在此示例中，首先使用连接来将 SQL Server 表中的数据读取到 @no__t 实例。In this example, the connection is first used to read data from a SQL Server table to a instance. 然后，打开第二个连接以大容量复制数据。Then a second connection is opened to bulk copy the data. 请注意，源数据不必位于 SQL Server 上;可以使用任何可读取到 @no__t 0 或加载到 的数据源。Note that the source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 `Dispose` 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复制操作从读取器中的下一个可用行开始。The copy operation starts at the next available row in the reader. 大多数情况下，读取器只是由 或类似调用返回，因此下一个可用行是第一行。Most of the time, the reader was just returned by or a similar call, so the next available row is the first row. 若要处理多个结果，请在数据读取器上调用 ，并再次调用 。To process multiple results, call on the data reader and call again. 请注意，使用 会修改读取器的状态。Note that using modifies the state of the reader. 方法将调用 ，直到返回 false、操作中止或发生错误。The method will call until it returns false, the operation is aborted, or an error occurs. 这意味着，当 操作完成时，数据读取器将处于不同的状态，可能在结果集的末尾。This means that the data reader will be in a different state, probably at the end of the result set, when the operation is complete. 当大容量复制操作正在进行时，关联的目标 正忙于提供服务，并且不能对该连接执行任何其他操作。While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection. @No__t-0 集合从数据读取器列映射到目标数据库表。The collection maps from the data reader columns to the destination database table. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序演示如何从 @no__t 中大容量加载数据。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data from a . 目标表是**AdventureWorks**数据库中的表。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ConnectionString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ConnectionString/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ConnectionString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ConnectionString/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Copies only rows that match the supplied row state in the supplied to a destination table specified by the property of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有 @no__t 为 `rowState` 参数中指示的状态中的行，未删除的行才会复制到目标表中。Only rows in the that are in the states indicated in the `rowState` argument and have not been deleted are copied to the destination table. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定 ，则还会将任何 、 和 @no__t 行复制到服务器。If is specified, any , , and rows will also be copied to the server. 不会引发异常。No exception will be raised. 当大容量复制操作正在进行时，关联的目标 正忙于提供服务，并且不能对该连接执行任何其他操作。While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection. @No__t-0 集合从 @no__t 列映射到目标数据库表。The collection maps from the columns to the destination database table. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序演示如何仅在 中大容量加载与指定状态匹配的行。The following Console application demonstrates how to bulk load only the rows in a that match a specified state. 在这种情况下，只会添加未更改的行。In this case, only unchanged rows are added. 目标表是**AdventureWorks**数据库中的表。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. 在此示例中，将在运行时创建一个 @no__t 0，并向其中添加三个行。In this example, a is created at run time and three rows are added to it. 在执行 方法之前，将编辑某一行。Before the method is executed, one of the rows is edited. 使用 @no__t `rowState` 参数调用 方法，因此仅将两个未更改的行大容量复制到目标。The method is called with a `DataRowState.Unchanged` `rowState` argument, so only the two unchanged rows are bulk copied to the destination. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用**SqlBulkCopy**的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 的异步版本，它将所有行从数据源复制到 对象的 属性指定的目标表。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which copies all rows from a data source to a destination table specified by the property of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果禁用多个活动的结果集（MARS）， 会使连接繁忙。If multiple active result sets (MARS) is disabled, makes the connection busy. 如果启用了 MARS，则可以将对 的调用交替到相同连接中的其他命令。If MARS is enabled, you can interleave calls to with other commands in the same connection. 失败时回滚的行数取决于以下几项：The number of rows that are rolled back when one fails depends on several things: - 如果指定 。If is specified. - 如果有您自己的事务。If you have your own transaction. - 的值。The value of . 如果在向服务器发送数据时出现错误，则将回滚当前批处理（由 指定）。When there is an error while sending data to the server, the current batch (as specified by ) will be rolled back. 如果未指定 ，并且您有自己的事务，则将回滚整个事务（也包括前面的所有批处理）。If is not specified and you have your own transaction, the entire transaction will be rolled back (which includes all previous batches as well). 使用 来了解已将多少行复制到服务器。Use to know how many rows were copied to the server.
